const response = await client.indices.close({
  index: "index",
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.indices.putSettings({
  index: "index",
  settings: {
    index: {
      similarity: {
        default: {
          type: "boolean",
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);

const response2 = await client.indices.open({
  index: "index",
});
console.log(response2);
